name: Sub-optimal Sabotage
description:
This game was created for the 32-bit jam 2022.

I decided to roll with the theme 'The Ocean' and base the game in a submarine in said 'Ocean'.

The objective of the game is for you to infiltrate an enemy submarine and find a way to sink it from the inside and escape safely.

There are a couple different ways to complete your objective, so good luck figuring it out (hopefully its not too difficult).

Had some problems with the WEBGL, unfortunately (maybe fortunately) the game runs at higher resolution than I wanted, and the sounds are un-compressed. For the "authentic" experience I recommend you download the .zip and play the game that way, so the res is low and the audio is compressed correctly.

Controls:

WASD move

Left Mouse click shoot

Right Mouse click aim

R reload

E use/activate

Sorry if you encounter any bugs, I tried to fix as many as I could but some must've slipped past.

If you are reading this, thanks for playing/checking out the game! :)
